```{r}
#| label: setup

# load packages
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(tidyverse))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(modelsummary))
library(dotenv)
```

```{r}
#| label: data generation

df <- tibble(
    x1 = rnorm(250),
    x2 = rnorm(250)
)
df$y <- df$x1 - 2 * df$x2 + rnorm(nrow(df))
```

```{r}
#| label: reporting
#| tbl-cap: Data summary

datasummary_skim(
    df, 
    fun_numeric = list(
        Mean = Mean, 
        SD = SD
    )
)
```

```{r}
#| label: saving output
write_csv(df, "./data/data.csv")
```
